author: pieterdavid
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a SiStripCalCosmicsNano ALCARECO, which is SiStripCalCosmics in NanoAOD format (also known as ALCANANO); it is a backport for testing during the upcoming CRAFT run, see the discussion in the original PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34985#issuecomment-919756131 .

#### PR validation:

Compiles, `scram b runtests` and `runTheMatrix.py -l 138.1` run. The only conflict in the rebase was with the changes from https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35073 and trivial to resolve.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34985

CC: @robervalwalsh @mdelcourt @ataliercio @jandrejk @mmusich @tsusa @mariadalfonso @gouskos
title: [12_0_X] Add SiStripCalCosmics ALCANANO
